views_handler_sort_menu_hierarchy Class Reference
[Views' sort handlers]

Inheritance diagram for views_handler_sort_menu_hierarchy:

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

 query ()

Detailed Description

Sort in menu hierarchy order.

Given a field name of 'p' this produces an ORDER BY on p1, p2, ..., p9. This is only really useful for the {menu_links} table.

Member Function Documentation

views_handler_sort_menu_hierarchy::query (  ) 

Called to add the sort to a query.

Reimplemented from views_handler_sort.
